# 4. Applications
```{r}
library(DoseFinding)
library(nlme)
data(neurodeg)
```
## 4.1. Longitudinal modeling of neurodegenerative disease
```{r}
fm <- lme(resp ~ as.factor(dose):time, neurodeg, ~time|id)
muH <- fixef(fm)[-1] # extract estimates
covH <- vcov(fm)[-1,-1]
```
